H0.text: Who was elected Governor of the US State of Texas in 1994. Ann Richards

H1.text: Who was elected Governor of the US State of Texas in 1994. Rick Perry

H2.text: Who was elected Governor of the US State of Texas in 1994. Kay Bailey Hutchison

H3.text: Who was elected Governor of the US State of Texas in 1994. Dubya

A4.text: She was defeated in the 1994 Texas gubernatorial election by George W. Bush.

A5.text: she was defeated, with 45.88% of the vote to Bush's 53.48%

A6.text: Bush carried 188 of the state's 254 counties

A7.text: Bush's campaigning on cultural and religious issues resonated with many Texan voters

A9.text: When Perry won the general election on November 2, 2010, he joined Shivers, Price Daniel, and John Connally as the only Texas governors elected to three terms.
